title: Hai kuo tian kong
lyrics: Gam tin ngoh hon ye lui hon suet piu gwong Waai jeuk laang keuk liu dik sam woh piu yuen fong Fung yue lui jui gon mo lui fan bat ching ying jung Tin hung hoi foot nei yue ngoh hoh wooi bin (Sui moot joi bin) Doh siu chi ying jeuk laang ngaan yue jaau siu Chung moot yau fong hei gwoh sam jung dik lei seung Yat saat na fong fat yeuk yau soh sat dik gam gok Bat ji bat gok yi bin daam sam lui ngoi (Sui ming baak ngoh) Yuen leung ngoh je yat saang bat gei fong jung ngoi ji yau Ya wooi pa yau yat tin wooi dit do (Oh no) Bui hei liu lei seung sui yan tau hoh yi Na wooi pa yau yat tin ji nei gung ngoh *  Ying yin ji yau ji ngoh Wing yuen go cheung ngoh goh jau pin chin lei Yuen leung ngoh je yat saang bat gei fong jung ngoi ji yau (Oh yeah) Ya wooi pa yau yat tin wooi dit do (Ooh) Bui hei liu lei seung sui yan do hoh yi (Woh ooh) Na wooi pa yau yat tin ji nei gung ngoh Bui hei liu lei seung sui yan do hoh yi Na wooi pa yau yat tin ji nei gung ngoh
